Auckland bank robber Eru Stevens jailed for $50,000 SkyCity Casino heisthttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-bank-robber-eru-stevens-jailed-for-50000-skycity-casino-heist/BONT3UGGXVFBBJQ2AQR7EK6QB4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-bank-robber-eru-stevens-jailed-for-50000-skycity-casino-heist/BONT3UGGXVFBBJQ2AQR7EK6QB4/ Craig KapitanEru Stevens has a history of robbery and schizophrenia. They go hand-in-hand, court told. Sun, 01 Dec 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Eru Andrew Stevens was sentenced to three years and 10 months' imprisonment in 2016 for twice robbing the same Kiwibank Post Shop in Pt Chevalier a year earlier. Photo / Supplied
